channel.title: SevenAtSevenSection1
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenSection1, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: CDC director is out after less than a month; other agency leaders resign
item.description: "Susan Monarez is no longer director of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention," the Department of Health and Human Services wrote in a social...

item.title: With India’s corporate banking lagging decades behind consumer fintech, TransBnk raises $25M to bridge the gap
item.description: TransBnk has raised $25 million in a round led by Bessemer Venture Partners to digitize India’s corporate banking.

item.title: The latest COVID vaccines come with new FDA limits
item.description: The Food and Drug Administration approved the next round of COVID-19 vaccines, but is restricting them to people at high risk for COVID complications.

item.title: Brands are loving Taylor Swift's engagement. Do they need to calm down?
item.description: Companies from Pillsbury to Invisalign to Olipop are cheering — and trying to cash in on — the couple's engagement. Experts spoke to NPR about how bra...

item.title: Greetings from the Negev desert, where traces remain of a vanished ancient civilization
item.description: Far-Flung Postcards is a weekly series in which NPR's international team shares moments from their lives and work around the world.

item.title: Colleges see significant drop in international students as fall semester begins
item.description: Delays and increased screenings for visas mean that many students didn't make it to campus on time – and that has some big implications for the econom...

item.title: 911 centers are so understaffed, they’re turning to AI to answer calls
item.description: The company offers an AI voice assistant that helps 911 centers handle non-emergency calls.

item.title: WhatsApp’s new AI feature lets you rephrase and adjust the tone of your messages
item.description: With Writing Help, users can get AI-generated suggestions that rewrite their messages in professional, funny, supportive, or rephrased way.

item.title: 8 Niche Real Estate Investments Outperforming in 2025
item.description: They say the riches are in the niches—and nowhere is that more true than in real estate investing. As someone who reviews vastly different real estate...

item.title: Google launches new device protection program called Pixel Care+
item.description: Google says Pixel Care+ provides a "higher level of coverage, service and peace of mind for Google hardware owners."

item.title: Nvidia reports record sales as the AI boom continues
item.description: Nvidia's revenue hit $46.7 billion in the second quarter, a 56% increase compared to the same period last year.
